summary:
Visit the Nursery Home (a Hobbit House) for young creatures of Skyrim. You can chat with these creatures (wait – follow- trade – favor – dismiss), and with 3 Dwarven Companions (Commander - Trooper - Empress).Take away memories of your visit (Spell Books and Creatures in a Jar).
With these Spell Books you can really fly in the sky
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Creatures House[/size][/color][/b] [i][b]3 Companions, 30 Followers, 41 Mounts ...[/b][/i]

The DLCs Dawnguard/ Dragonborn, and eventually[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] or [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720/?l=english] Skyrim Script Extender [/url] are required

This mod also works without SKSE but the creatures fly at ground level !

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7N9aU9S.gif[/img]

Visit the Nursery Home (in a Hobbit House!) for young (and little) creatures of Skyrim. You can chat with these creatures (wait – follow- trade – favor – dismiss) inside and outside the house, and with 3 Dwarven Companions (Commander - Trooper - Empress)

Take away memories of your visit (Spell Books and Creatures in a Jar)

[URL=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012106110616616015486712.jpg][IMG]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/21//18012106110616616015486712.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

With these Spell Books you can really fly in the sky of Skyrim (37 Mounts: Seht's Dovah-Fly (Dwarven Mount), Magic Anomaly, Flame Atronach, Stormy, Pazuzu, Azraël, Nerthus, Dwarven Eyebot, Dwarven Droid, Dwarven Empress, Dwarven Sweeper, Bone Fire Dragon, Bone Frost Dragon, Death Dragon, Red Dragon, Swamp Dragon, Snow Dragon, Spectrum, Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Ahzidal, Dukaan, Seeker, Netch, Flying Shoggoth, Spectral Dragon, Soul Wisp, Skeleton Mistman, Flame Queen, Flame Storm, Flesh Spirit, Storm Spirit, Flame Spirit, Frost Spirit, Frost Anomaly, Spectral Fire Dragon, Spectral Storm Dragon)


[i]The Creatures Nursery is located between the Western Watchtower and Whiterun[/i]


This mod is an improved version of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67759/?] Fully Flying Mounts [/url] ([b]You must remove this mod before installing this one[/b])


[color=#ff7700][b]Journées Portes Ouvertes ![/b]

Venez visiter la Maison des Créatures de Bordeciel, et remportez un souvenir gratuit (créature dans un bocal, ou bien livre pour invoquer une créature volante que vous pourrez chevaucher) ...

Vous pouvez même repartir accompagné de la créature de votre choix (mais celle-ci devra revenir dans cette garderie !)

[i]Munissez-vous de SKSE et des DLCs Dawnguard/Dragonborn pour que votre visite se passe dans les meilleures conditions possibles.[/i][/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ZLMJlNy.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000]CONTROLS OF THE FLYING MOUNTS[/color][/b]


[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]


When flying press [color=#ff0000]F12 [/color] to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

If there is a problem with the F12 key, uncheck the mod, make a backup and then check again the mod

[color=#ff0000]ATTENTION: You MUST mount the Summoned Creature, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color]



[b][color=#ff0000]SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/color][/b]


You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 37 books...(Normally, this is done automatically)

To have the [b][color=#00ff00]36 Summonable Mounts [/color][/b] you can buy the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 60 min.)...

[color=#00ff00]ATTENTION: You MUST mount the Summoned Creature, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color]

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Flying Mount"



[b][color=#ff0000]CREDITS[/color][/b]


[color=#ff0000] NoxyGame and DOSMaster [/color]for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/?] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url] “feel free to use/enhance the script/nif/mod, but give credits to the authors”

[color=#ff0000] Vicn [/color]for the meshes of many creatures in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

[color=#ff0000] Stroti –Tamira - Malo [/color] for the Hobbit House in the mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61656/?] Stroti's Hobbit Home Resource [/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66176/?] Marnya - My Hobbit Home [/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64590/?] Stroti Resource Pack II[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62787/? ] Stroti's Treehouse Resource [/url],
and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54152/?] Malo Statues [/url]

[color=#ff0000] Tlaffoon[/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68040/?] Tlaffoon's Rugs and Tapestries [/url]

[color=#ff0000] SrRamrod[/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68410/?] SrRamrods Stained Glass Lanterns Art [/url]

[color=#ff0000] Dogtown1 [/color] for the meshes/textures of Azraël and Death Angel (Reaper spirit) in his [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=432877090 ] Skymomod [/url]

For the Mini Dragons: all the bone, naga, and other dragon models that are rigged to the Ice Wraith skeleton were created and rigged by Dogtown1 in the Skyrim Monster Mod .The textures are from [color=#ff0000] lifestorok [/color] in his [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?] Skyrim Immersive Creatures [/url], Versions 2 and 3; and Bellyaches in Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer

[color=#ff0000] Kelretu[/color] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72758/?] Shrine of Syrabane [/url]

[color=#ff8c00]Razorpony[/color] for the Dwemer Horse in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33321 ]Dwemer Steam Horse [/url]("Free modders resource" and "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

[color=#ff8c00]Verkister aka me [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58214/?] Dwemer Dog Follower [/url]for the mesh of the Dwemer Dog ("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me ")

[color=#ff0000] FrankTheFish [/color] (Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12647 ]Prides of Skyrim [/url] ) for the Lion ( “You may use my Lions and other big cats as long as proper credit is given”).

New Lion model from the team (-in the credits of FrankTheFish-):

"[color=#ff0000]Targaryen [/color](for the Mane of the lion)
[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba [/color](for the Tail)
[color=#ff0000]TreasureChest [/color](for the Teeth)
[color=#ff0000]DVAted [/color](for the effort of making the new model possible)"
The textures of lions are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color] ; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621 ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

[color=#ff0000]DVAted's team[/color] for the Tiger model:

Targaryen, tumbajamba & TreasureChest (model)
DVAted (textures and model direction)"

[color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/? ]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")

[color=#ff0000]CRO White Wolf [/color] for his mod[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1082/? ] CRO White Wolf and Astarcis Wolf Textures [/url] With the Texture of the Desert (little)Fox

[color=#ff0000] gothic2392/ 530gothic25 [/color] for the meshes/textures of Male Deer, Female Deer, Fawn, Eurasian Lynx, in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37999/?] Skyrim Wildlife Overhaul [/url] (“give me credit at least”)

[color=#ff0000] Grilli[/color] for the creatures in a jar, mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26888/?] Mini Zoo [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29868/?] Arena Island [/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/532082/?] katkat [/url] for the Unicorn in his mod [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/7158-edinorogi-dlya-halyavschikov/]Единороги для халявщиков/Unicorns [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Gizmodian/DaggerfallTeam[/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83953/?] Gothic Resource Set Remastered [/url]

[color=#ff0000]MihailMods[/color] for the Seht's Dovah-Fly in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86501/?] Seht's Dovah-Fly Pet - Dunmer Culture pt. 3 (mihail immersive add-ons - ESO - fabricant)[/url]

Free sounds for the Followers



[b][color=#ff0000]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/color][/b]


[color=#00ff00]1) Followers[/color]


In the house the little creatures (fox…) have difficulties to climb the steps, so be patient, they always succeed


You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0


[color=#00ff00]2) Summonable Mounts[/color]


[color=#00ff00]ATTENTION: You MUST mount the Summoned Creature, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color]

You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

With Dwarven Empress, Azraël, Nerthus, Flame Queen, Spectrum and the Mini Dragons, if your mount disappears (with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll wheel or FAST TRAVEL
author: gg77

files.name: Creatures House 2.7
files.changelogHtml:
2.7: Fixed multiple bugs in the version 2.6 (invisible mounts, no sounds for some followers)

2.6: Adds Seht's Dovah-Fly (Dwarven Mount)

2.5: Adds static items with a gothic theme

2.3: Adds 2 Companions (Dwarven Trooper + Dwarven Empress)

2.2: Adds Unicorn

2.1: Adds new followers and a new mount

2.0: Adds an Extension for the house, with new rooms, new followers and ...
